workflow.name: Generate Google ad copy automatically with Claude 3.5, Channable & Relevance AI
workflow.description:
---

# üöÄ **Channable + Google Ads + Relevance AI: Scalable AI Workflow for Automated Ad Copy Generation & Publishing**

---

## üß© Overview

This workflow automates the **entire ad creation process for Google Ads** by integrating product data, AI-generated copy, compliance checks, and publication into your marketing pipeline.

It connects **n8n**, **Relevance AI**, **Google Sheets**, and optionally **Channable** to:

* Fetch product data from your catalog
* Generate Google Text Ad headlines and descriptions using Relevance AI
* Validate character limits and ensure Google Ads compliance
* Route non-compliant ads to a Slack review channel
* Save compliant, ready-to-publish ads in Google Sheets
* Notify your marketing team automatically after each generation cycle

---

## üß† Key Benefits

‚úÖ 100% automated ad copy pipeline
‚úÖ AI-generated, human-quality Google Ads text
‚úÖ Built-in compliance verification (Google Ads policy)
‚úÖ Google Sheet integration for team review
‚úÖ Daily automatic schedule (zero manual effort)
‚úÖ Slack alerts for QA and transparency
‚úÖ Modular design ‚Äî extendable for Shopping and Performance Optimization
‚úÖ Scalable for 10 ‚Üí 10,000+ product ads

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è System Architecture

### Tech Stack

* **n8n** ‚Äì Automation Orchestrator
* **Relevance AI** ‚Äì AI tools for copy generation and policy compliance
* **Google Sheets** ‚Äì Data storage and team collaboration
* **Slack** ‚Äì Real-time alerts and notifications
* *(Optional)* **Channable** ‚Äì Product feed integration

---

## üß≠ Workflow Logic

```
Daily Trigger (00:00)
   ‚¨áÔ∏è
1Ô∏è‚É£ Get Product Feed (Channable or custom API)
   ‚¨áÔ∏è
2Ô∏è‚É£ Split Into Batches (50 products each)
   ‚¨áÔ∏è
3Ô∏è‚É£ Generate Ad Copy (Relevance AI tool ‚Üí Claude 3.5 prompt)
   ‚¨áÔ∏è
4Ô∏è‚É£ Validate Character Limits (JS node: max 30 headline / 90 description)
   ‚¨áÔ∏è
5Ô∏è‚É£ Compliance Check (Relevance AI agent ‚Üí Google Ads policies)
   ‚¨áÔ∏è
6Ô∏è‚É£ IF Compliant ‚Üí CSV / Google Sheets
    ‚Ü≥ ‚ùå Non-Compliant ‚Üí Slack Alert
   ‚¨áÔ∏è
7Ô∏è‚É£ Aggregate Batches + Generate CSV
   ‚¨áÔ∏è
8Ô∏è‚É£ Save to Google Sheets (‚ÄúGenerated Ads‚Äù tab)
   ‚¨áÔ∏è
9Ô∏è‚É£ Slack Notification ‚Üí Summary Report
```

---

## üìã Environment Variables

Set these in **n8n ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Variables ‚Üí Add Variable**

Copy-paste from your `ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLES_CORRECTED.txt`.

Includes:

* ‚úÖ Relevance AI region, API key, tool & agent IDs
* ‚úÖ Google Ads, Merchant Center, and Sheets credentials
* ‚úÖ Slack channel name
* ‚úÖ Optional Channable endpoint

### Example:

```bash
RELEVANCE_AI_API_URL=https://api-f1db6c.stack.tryrelevance.com/latest
RELEVANCE_TOOL_AD_COPY_ID=bueQG8io04dw
RELEVANCE_AGENT_COMPLIANCE_ID=xT29mQ4QKsl
GOOGLE_SHEET_ID=1q2w3e4r5t6y7u8i9o0p
SLACK_CHANNEL=#google-ads-automation
```

---

## üèóÔ∏è Node-by-Node Breakdown

| Node                                   | Description                                     | Endpoint / Logic                                                              |
| -------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| üïì **Schedule Trigger**                | Runs daily at 00:00                             | Cron `0 0 * * *`                                                              |
| üì¶ **Get Product Feed**                | Pulls product data from Channable or custom API | `GET {{$env.CHANNABLE_API_URL}}/v1/projects/{{$env.PROJECT_ID}}/items`        |
| üßÆ **Split Into Batches**              | Processes 50 products at a time                 | Avoids rate limits                                                            |
| ‚úçÔ∏è **Generate Ad Copy (Relevance AI)** | Calls AI tool for each product                  | `POST {{$env.RELEVANCE_AI_API_URL}}/tools/google_text_ad_copy_generator/run`  |
| üîç **Validate Character Limits**       | JS validation (‚â§30 headline / ‚â§90 description)  | Truncates smartly                                                             |
| üß† **Compliance Check Agent**          | Verifies Google Ads compliance                  | `POST {{$env.RELEVANCE_AI_API_URL}}/agents/google_ads_compliance_checker/run` |
| ‚öñÔ∏è **IF Compliant**                    | Routes APPROVED vs REJECTED                     | `"contains 'APPROVED'"`                                                       |
| üíæ **Format for CSV**                  | Formats compliant ads for export                | Maps ID, headline, desc, URLs                                                 |
| üìä **Aggregate Batches**               | Combines all results                            | Merges datasets                                                               |
| üß± **Generate CSV File**               | Converts JSON ‚Üí CSV                             | Escaped string-safe format                                                    |
| üìë **Save to Google Sheets**           | Saves reviewed ads                              | Sheet: `Generated Ads`                                                        |
| üì¢ **Slack Notification (Success)**    | Posts completion summary                        | Shows ad count, timestamp                                                     |
| üö® **Slack Alert (Non-Compliant)**     | Notifies team for review                        | Includes issues, category                                                     |

---

## üîë API Authentication Setup

### üîπ Relevance AI

* Create ‚ÄúHTTP Header Auth‚Äù credential

  ```
  Header Name: Authorization
  Header Value: Bearer {{$env.RELEVANCE_AI_API_KEY}}
  ```

### üîπ Google Sheets

* Credential type: ‚ÄúGoogle OAuth2 API‚Äù
* Scopes:

  ```
  https://www.googleapis.com/auth/spreadsheets
  https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.file
  ```

### üîπ Slack

* Create Slack App ‚Üí Add Bot Token Scopes ‚Üí `chat:write`
* Paste token in n8n ‚ÄúSlack API‚Äù credential.

### üîπ (Optional) Channable

* Header Auth:

  ```
  Bearer {{$env.CHANNABLE_API_TOKEN}}
  ```

---

## üß© Google Sheet Template

**Sheet name:** `Generated Ads`

**Columns:**

```
| product_id | headline | description | final_url | display_url | generated_at |
```

Optional: Add `compliance_status` or `notes` columns for QA.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Testing Procedure

1. **Manual Trigger:** Disable the schedule ‚Üí click ‚ÄúExecute Workflow‚Äù.
2. **Batch Size:** Start small (3 products).
3. **Expected Output:**

   * ‚úÖ Ad copy generated
   * ‚úÖ Character limits validated
   * ‚úÖ Slack alerts for rejects
   * ‚úÖ Google Sheet filled

Check logs in **Executions** for errors.
Re-enable the cron trigger after successful validation.

---

## üßæ Example Output

| product_id | headline           | description                                   | final_url                                        | display_url | generated_at         |
| ---------- | ------------------ | --------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ----------- | -------------------- |
| 12243      | ‚ÄúEco Bamboo Socks‚Äù | ‚ÄúSoft, breathable comfort for everyday wear.‚Äù | [https://shop.com/socks](https://shop.com/socks) | shop.com    | 2025-10-22T00:00:00Z |

---

## üì¨ Slack Alert Templates

**‚úÖ Success Notification**

```
‚úÖ *Google Ads Generation Complete*

üìä *Summary:*
‚Ä¢ Total Ads Generated: 50
‚Ä¢ Saved to Google Sheets: Generated Ads
‚Ä¢ Timestamp: 2025-10-22T00:00:00Z
```

**‚ö†Ô∏è Non-Compliant Alert**

```
‚ö†Ô∏è Non-Compliant Ad Flagged

Product: Bamboo Socks
Issues:
- Contains ‚ÄúFree Shipping‚Äù
- Headline too long

Timestamp: 2025-10-22T00:00:00Z
```

---

## üß∞ Maintenance & Monitoring

| Frequency | Task                             |
| --------- | -------------------------------- |
| Daily     | Check Slack alerts for rejects   |
| Weekly    | Review ad performance metrics    |
| Monthly   | Update Relevance AI prompts      |
| Quarterly | Refresh API tokens and variables |

---

## üìä Success Metrics

* ‚úÖ Compliance approval rate: **>85%**
* üö´ Disapproval rate: **<5%**
* üìà CTR improvement: **+15‚Äì25%**
* ‚è±Ô∏è Time saved: **10‚Äì15 hours/week**
* üåê Scalable: **1,000+ ads/day**

---

## ü™ú Next Steps

1. Deploy and monitor for 7 days.
2. After 30 days ‚Üí activate **Workflow 2: Performance Optimization Loop**.
3. Extend to **Shopping Feed Optimization**.
4. Add **multi-language generation** using Relevance AI.
5. Integrate **Google Ads API publishing** (full automation).

---

## üîó Resources

* [n8n Docs](https://docs.n8n.io)
* [Relevance AI Docs](https://relevanceai.com/docs)
* [Google Ads API](https://developers.google.com/google-ads/api)
* [Merchant API](https://developers.google.com/merchant/api)
* [Channable Help](https://help.channable.com)

---

## üéâ Conclusion

You now have a **production-ready, scalable AI-powered ad generation system** integrating
**Channable**, **Google Ads**, and **Relevance AI** ‚Äî built entirely on **n8n**.

This delivers:

* üí° AI creativity at scale
* ‚úÖ Google Ads policy compliance
* ‚öôÔ∏è Hands-free daily automation
* üìä Transparent reporting and collaboration

> Start small ‚Üí validate ‚Üí scale to 10,000+ ads per day.
> Within weeks, you‚Äôll have a **self-learning, always-on ad pipeline** driving consistent performance.

---

nodes.name: Get Product Feed
nodes.notes: CORRECTED: Uses v1 API if available, or replace with your e-commerce platform feed endpoint

nodes.name: Format for CSV
nodes.notes: Formats compliant ads into CSV structure

nodes.name: Alert - Non-Compliant
nodes.notes: Sends Slack alert for non-compliant ads. Can replace with Email node.

nodes.name: Aggregate Batches
nodes.notes: Combines all processed batches into single dataset

nodes.name: Save to Google Sheets
nodes.notes: CORRECTED: Saves CSV data to Google Sheets instead of Channable API upload (which doesn't exist). You can then: 1) Import manually to Google Ads, 2) Use Channable scheduled import, or 3) Build Google Ads API direct upload

nodes.name: Schedule Trigger - Daily1
nodes.notes: Triggers workflow daily at midnight. Can also be triggered manually.

nodes.name: Split Into Batches1
nodes.notes: Processes 50 products at a time to avoid API rate limits

nodes.name: Generate Ad Copy - Relevance AI1
nodes.notes: CORRECTED: Uses /trigger endpoint with tool ID from environment variable. Get your actual tool ID after creating in Relevance AI.

nodes.name: Validate Character Limits1
nodes.notes: Validates headline ‚â§30 chars and description ‚â§90 chars. This is the fix from the YouTube video for accurate character counting.

nodes.name: Compliance Check Agent1
nodes.notes: CORRECTED: Uses /agents/trigger with agent_id in body. Get your actual agent ID from Relevance AI.

nodes.name: IF Compliant1
nodes.notes: Routes ads based on compliance status. APPROVED ads go to formatting, others trigger alert.

nodes.name: Generate CSV File1
nodes.notes: Converts JSON to properly escaped CSV format

parameters.content:
## üü¶ Schedule Trigger - Daily

### üïì Purpose: Automatically runs every night at midnight (0 0 * * *).
Tip: You can also execute manually for testing.

üí° Use to refresh and generate new ad copy daily.

## üü¶ Get Product Feed (Channable)
### üì¶ Purpose: Fetches live product data (title, price, brand, description, category).
API: GET {{$env.CHANNABLE_API_URL}}/v1/projects/{{$env.PROJECT_ID}}/items

#### ‚öôÔ∏è Replace or connect to your store‚Äôs API if Channable isn‚Äôt used.
‚úÖ Returns all active products for ad generation.

## üü¶ Split Into Batches

### üßÆ Purpose: Processes up to 50 products per batch.

Prevents hitting API rate limits from Relevance AI or Channable.
‚ö° Adjust batch size depending on product volume and plan limits.

## üü¶ Generate Ad Copy - Relevance AI
### ‚úçÔ∏è Purpose: Calls your Relevance AI Tool to generate Google Ads headlines & descriptions.
API: POST /tools/google_text_ad_copy_generator/run

Uses product title, description, price, brand, and category.
üß† Model: Claude 3.5 / GPT-4 via Relevance AI.

## üü¶ Validate Character Limits

üîç Purpose: Ensures headlines ‚â§30 chars and descriptions ‚â§90 chars.

Uses JavaScript to count accurately and truncate gracefully.
‚ú® Automatically cleans trailing punctuation and spaces.
üí° Fixes the common issue where ads get disapproved for ‚Äútoo long‚Äù text.

## üü¶ Compliance Check Agent

üß† Purpose: Checks generated ad text for Google Ads policy compliance.
API: POST /agents/google_ads_compliance_checker/run

Flags emojis, exaggerated claims, restricted terms, etc.
Returns "APPROVED" or "REJECTED".
üîê Uses your Relevance AI Agent ID.

With a background in performance marketing, user acquisition, and retention strategies, I use n8n to connect data, automate repetitive tasks, and scale growth across the funnel.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
